Michael C. Aquilino
President & CEO Innovational Services, Proven Results in Leadership Development, Executive Coaching, Career Transition
October 9, 2015, Mark was a client of Michael C.’s

Michael and I began working together when I decided get help transforming my dreams into reality to further my core mission of improving outcomes for patients and ending needless suffering.  My intent was to create a practice so I could heal patients, create books and other forms of media so I could spread the word to anyone who would listen, incite a revolution around healthcare delivery, and teach the medical community how to heal through lifestyle – all while maintaining a busy household full of loved ones and pets and maintaining healthy and vibrant friendships all around the globe.  Sounds easy, right?  Not so much.  On the professional front, as my practice grew, so did my team and my responsibilities.  In order to step up to the role of leader, motivator and mentor, I needed someone to coach me.  Enter Michael Aquilino.  Michael has led me through a complete transformation of my organization, helping me to hire the best people, create alignment, and communicate directly to achieve synergy and outstanding results.  Most importantly, he has challenged me to confront and correct self-created obstacles that were impeding my success.  A decade later, I can state that Michael’s insight and expert guidance has helped me to achieve amazing growth in my company.  He now coaches key members of my clinical team to empower them to stay focused, become leaders and achieve balance in their busy lives.  On a personal level – there have been many changes throughout the years – most for the better, some for the worse.  Through it all, Michael’s unfailing support, accessibility and ability to bring me back to center has enabled me to stay focused on what matters.  Simply put:  Through Michael’s leadership and personal development skills, he has helped me to fly high on several levels while keeping me grounded so I stay true to my mission, my family and myself.  Mark Hyman, MD  Founder, The UltraWellness Center , Chairman, Institute for Functional Medicine Director, The Cleveland Clinic Center for Functional Medicine Author, Speaker, Teacher

David Kuenstle
Marketing Communications Consultant
August 12, 2014, Mark was a client of David’s

Dave and I collaborated on my best-selling program The 5 Forces of Wellness: The UltraPrevention System for Living an Active, Age-Defying, Disease Free Life. One of the things I enjoyed most about working with Dave is witnessing firsthand his passion for delivering quality and poignant healthcare information to consumers. Because of his expertise in editorial content strategy, he was able to organize my material from both our studio recordings and one of my live seminars into a cohesive, educational and informative multi-media healthcare product. Knowing this product intimately, Dave also leveraged his integrated marketing skills into making my program a consistent bestseller for Nightingale-Conant. Based on his expertise, I then hired Dave to produce my Six Weeks to an UltraMind: Fix Your Broken Brain by Healing Your Body First program. Once again, we collaborated on delivering top notch quality information to healthcare consumers which is so desperately needed now. I highly recommend Dave because of his passion, expertise, follow through and attention to detail. He delivers!

summary: An internationally respected physician, researcher, educator, activist, and ten times #1 New York Times best-selling author, including Eat Fat Get Thin, The 10 Day Detox Diet, The 10 Day Detox Diet Cookbook,  The Daniel Plan, The Blood Sugar Solution (also a PBS special), The Blood Sugar Solution Cookbook, The UltraMind Solution (also a PBS special), The UltraSimple Diet, UltraMetabolism, and UltraPrevention (winner of the Books for a Better Life Award), Dr. Hyman has dedicated his life and career to ensuring optimal health – UltraWellness – for all individuals. His new book and PBS special, Eat Fat Get Thin, was released in March 2016 to address the global epidemic of obesity, diabetes, and cardiovascular and other related diseases.Dr. Hyman is the world’s leading pioneer and practitioner of a ground-breaking and emerging approach to medicine that treats our system, not our symptoms.Through functional medicine, we come to understand all the influences on our biology which are at the root of illness, and how our lifestyle and environment interact with our genes to create the imbalances or balances that are the real determinants of disease or poorDr. Hyman is the Director of the Cleveland Clinic Center for Functional Medicine,  founder and medical director of The UltraWellness Center in Lenox, Massachusetts, where he directs a team of physicians, nutritionists and nurses who utilize this comprehensive, life-changing approach to health, involving diet and lifestyle modifications, in combination with nutritional and specialized testing, nutritional supplementation, and medications to address individual needs, from creating wellness to treating chronic, complex medical problems.He maintains that our grocery store should be our drug store:  “What is at the end of our fork,” he declares, “is more essential and important than what it at the bottom of our pill bottles.” And, “each meal is a chance to heal.”Specialties: Functional Medicine
name: Mark Hyman, MD
title: Chairman, Institute for Functional Medicine
